bio.title: Currently doing research at MBZUAI, Abu-Dhabi
paragraphs: Currently I'm pursuing a PhD in Machine Learning at Mohamed bin Zayed University of Artificial Intelligence. My main research interests now cover causal representation learning, brain data analysis, causal AI and medical applications of AI.
I am also working as a Head of Engineering on contract basis at a startup GreenEye Ltd, where I contribute to the vision of the product and lead multiple engineering teams.
